story.storykicker: The Employees' State Insurance Corporation (ESIC), Delhi has released an employment notification, inviting interested, eligible candidates to attend the walk-in-interview for the positions of IT Manager and IT Assistant. A walk-in-interview will be conducted for selecting the candidates.
story.storybody:
The Employees' State Insurance Corporation (ESIC), Delhi has released an employment notification, inviting interested, eligible candidates to attend the walk-in-interview for the positions of IT Manager and IT Assistant on contractual basis.

Vacancy details

Total posts: 34

Name of the posts:

IT Manager: 12

IT Assistant: 22

Eligibility criteria

Educational qualification:

IT Manager: The candidates interested in applying for this post should have done B.E. /B.Tech. in Computer Science/IT with six to eight years of experience in incident, service request, problem, change management, service desk & IT service desk.

IT Assistant: The candidates interested in applying for this post should have done a BCA/diploma in CS/IT with two to four years of experience in breakdown calls and closer, within the assigned service parameters of response time, by proper allocation of time to achieve customer satisfaction.

Selection procedure:

A walk-in-interview will be conducted for selecting the candidates.

Pay scale

IT Manager: The selected candidates will be getting a monthly salary of Rs 50,000.

IT Assistant: The selected candidates will be getting a monthly salary of Rs 22,000.

How to apply

The candidates interested in these posts are required to appear for the walk-in-interview with relevant documents at respective regional offices.

They should produce any original government issued photo identity like, aadhar card, election photo identity card, passport, driving licence etc.

Important dates

The walk-in-interview will be conducted on June 13 and 14 at 10 am.

Read: Eyeing job in Delhi Development Authority: Apply for 675 Deputy Director, Assistant Director, other posts

Read: Want to work for BECIL? Apply now for various vacancies

For information on more latest government jobs, click here.
